info.question: IAM roles are global, not associated with any region?
You can't attach an IAM roles to a running EC2 instance?
You can attach an IAM roles to a running EC2 instance using which?
The url to get meta-data for an EC2 instance is used as such: as such http://___.___.___.___/_____/________?
An EC2 placement group is which?
answers: a logical grouping of instances within a single AZ
a logical grouping of instances spread across multiple AZs
a physical group of instances within a single AZ
a physical group of instances spread across multiple AZs
a logical group of instances behind a load balancer and an auto-scaling group
correctAnswer: a logical grouping of instances within a single AZ

info.question: Using EC2 placement groups enables _______?
answers: applications to participate in a low latency, 10 Gbps network
applications to spread their workload across multiple AZs using a load balancer
application to place specific components on selected EC2 instances
applications to run in multiple regions
correctAnswer: applications to participate in a low latency, 10 Gbps network

info.question: EC2 placement groups are recommended for _______?
answers: applications that benefit from low network latency
applications that benefit from high network throughput
applications that benefit from both low network latency and high network throughput
applications that benefit from speed covering great distances
correctAnswer: applications that benefit from both low network latency and high network throughput

info.question: Use cases for EC2 placement groups include _______?
An EC2 placement group can span multiple AZs?
The name you specify for your EC2 placement group must be unique within ________?
Only these types of EC2 instances can be launched with an EC2 placement group?
AWS recommends _________ EC2 instances within placement groups?
AWS recommends homogeneous EC2 instances within placement groups, meaning _________?
You can merge EC2 placement groups?
You can move an existing EC2 instance into a placement group?
To move an existing EC2 instance into a placement group you can do which?
answers: create an AMI from the existing EC2 instance, then launch a new instance from the AMI into a placement group
launch the existing instance into a plcaement group
create a snapshot of the existing EC2 instance's root volume, then launch the instace from the snapshot into the placement group
you can't move an existing EC2 instance into a placement group using any of these techniques
correctAnswer: create an AMI from the existing EC2 instance, then launch a new instance from the AMI into a placement group
